title: NATICNAE CONSENSUS SURVEYS
instructions: Please take a few minutes to go through the advertisements in this book. Please take as much time with each ad as you care to. If you ordinarily wear reading glasses you'll need them. Now I'd like to ask you a few questions about the ads in the book.

questions.question: What brands or products do you remember seeing ads for in the book?
questions.note: DO NOT READ EITHER BRAND NAMES OR PRODUCT CATEGORIES.

cigarette_questions.question: Do you remember any ads for cigarettes?
Do you remember any ads for any other brands of cigarettes?

skip_instructions: IF NO CIGARETTE BRANDS MENTIONED ABOVE ASK Q.3.
IF ONLY ONE OR TWO CIGARETTE BRANDS MENTIONED SKIP TO Q.3b.
IF ALL THREE CIGARETTE BRANDS MENTIONED SKIP TO Q.4.
IF NO CIGARETTE BRANDS MENTIONED ABOVE ASK
IF ONE OR TWO CIGARETTE BRANDS MENTIONED ASK
IF TRUE MENTIONED IN Q.23a CONTINUE
IF TRUE NOT MENTIONED IN Q.2.3 OR 3b SKIP TO Q.10.
